sen.j: 下間 頼旦（しもつま らいたん、生年不詳 - 天正2年（1574年））は、戦国時代 (日本)の大谷家の武将、僧。
sen.e: Raitan SHIMOTSUMA (year of birth unknown - 1574) was a monk and busho (Japanese military commander) of the Otani family who lived during the Sengoku period (Japan).

sen.j: 1574年、織田信長の伊勢国長島一向一揆が始まったとき、長島にいる一向宗を指導した。
sen.e: When the Nagashima Ikko Ikki (an uprising of Ikko sect followers in Nagashima) in Ise Province against Nobunaga ODA arose in 1574, Raitan lead the Ikko sect followers in Nagashima.

sen.e: However, Raitan surrendered in the face of a fierce attack by Oda army.

sen.j: しかしこれは信長の謀略で、頼旦は降伏して城から出たとき、織田軍によって門徒ともども虐殺されたという。
sen.e: This, however, turned out to be Nobunaga's conspiracy; it is said that when Raitan surrendered and came out of the castle, he and his followers were slaughtered by the Oda army.
